u_shaped_ranking.core_sentence: PAHs can enter the marine environment through atmospheric deposition, run-off, industrial discharges and
u_shaped_ranking.context_window: PAHs derived from combustion sources may be deposited directly to the marine environment already adsorbed to atmospheric particulates, such as soot. PAHs can enter the marine environment through atmospheric deposition, run-off, industrial discharges and as a result of oil spills. Sediment will act as a sink for PAHs in the marine environment.

Our vision is a clean, healthy and biologically diverse North-East Atlantic Ocean, which is productive, used sustainably and resilient to climate change and ocean acidification.

u_shaped_ranking.core_sentence: occur as a result of natural processes such as forest fires.
u_shaped_ranking.context_window: the combustion of fossil fuels and organic material, for example during activities at an oil refinery. PAHs also occur as a result of natural processes such as forest fires. PAHs enter the marine environment through atmospheric deposition, road run-off, industrial discharges and as a result of oil spills.

u_shaped_ranking.core_sentence: Analysis was also restricted to
u_shaped_ranking.context_window: For temporal trends, those monitoring sites that were representative of general conditions were considered and those monitoring sites impacted due to a point source were excluded. Analysis was also restricted to assessment areas where there were at least three monitoring sites with trend information and where those monitoring sites had reasonable geographic spread.

u_shaped_ranking.core_sentence: which they live and feed.
u_shaped_ranking.context_window: Associations have been demonstrated between the incidence of some diseases in flatfish and the concentrations of PAHs in the sediment over which they live and feed.
